title: Melasti Beach Cliffside Escape (Half-day)
overview: Experience the dramatic cliffs and turquoise waters of Melasti Beach, perfect for relaxation and stunning photography.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the beach, swim, or relax on the white sand.
Enjoy panoramic views and take photos from the cliffs.

title: Melasti Beach & Spiritual Cleansing (Full-day)
overview: A full day at Melasti Beach, including time for swimming, cliff walks, and a visit to the local spiritual cleansing site.

stops.description: Arrive and relax, swim, or sunbathe on the beach.
Lunch at a local warung with ocean views.
Participate in or observe a traditional Melasti cleansing ceremony (if available).
Walk along the cliffs and capture the scenery.
